Package science.aist.machinelearning.core.experiment

Class Experiment<ST,​PT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • science.aist.machinelearning.core.experiment.Experiment<ST,​PT>
  • Type Parameters:
    ST - Solution Type
    PT - Problem Type
    public class Experiment<ST,​PT>
extends Object
    Class for conducting machinelearning experiments.

    The Experiment will attempt to conduct every single permutation of configuration options for the given amount of repeats. IF you want to exclude specific permutations see ExperimentGroup

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Oliver Krauss

    • Method Detail

      • createProblemChoices

        public static <O> Choice<Problem<O>> createProblemChoices​(String name,
                                                          O problem)
        Helper function that takes the problem genes and creates a Configurable out of it. It will not prepare any choices
        Type Parameters:
        O - anything that is a Problem Gene
        Parameters:
        name - Human Readable name given to problem
        problem - Single Gene To be turned into a Choice. If problem does not extend Configurable it will be a single choice
        Returns:
        the choice

      • createProblemChoices

        public static <O> Choice<Problem<O>> createProblemChoices​(String name,
                                                          O problem,
                                                          boolean prepareChoices,
                                                          boolean makeValuesExchangeable)
        Helper function that takes the problem genes and creates a Configurable out of it.
        Type Parameters:
        O - anything that is a Problem Gene
        Parameters:
        name - Human Readable name given to problem
        problem - Single Gene To be turned into a Choice. If problem does not extend Configurable it will be a single choice
        prepareChoices - if true all choices will be prepared with as many choices as possible. If false everything will be set to FixedChoice
        makeValuesExchangeable - if true for any complex configuration (incl. Configurable) a SingleUnwrappingChoice is used to allow switching of classes (ex. multiple Mutators)
        Returns:
        the choice

      • createProblemChoices

        public static <O> Choice<Problem<O>> createProblemChoices​(String name,
                                                          List<O> problem)
        Helper function that takes the problem genes and creates a Configurable out of it. It will not prepare any options
        Type Parameters:
        O - anything that is a Problem Gene
        Parameters:
        name - Human Readable name given to problem
        problem - To be turned into a Choice. If problem does not extend Configurable it will be a single choice
        Returns:
        the choice

      • createProblemChoices

        public static <O> Choice<Problem<O>> createProblemChoices​(String name,
                                                          List<O> problem,
                                                          boolean prepareChoices,
                                                          boolean makeValuesExchangeable)
        Helper function that takes the problem genes and creates a Configurable out of it.
        Type Parameters:
        O - anything that is a Problem Gene
        Parameters:
        name - Human Readable name given to problem
        problem - To be turned into a Choice. If problem does not extend Configurable it will be a single choice
        prepareChoices - if true all choices will be prepared with as many choices as possible. If false everything will be set to FixedChoice
        makeValuesExchangeable - if true for any complex configuration (incl. Configurable) a SingleUnwrappingChoice is used to allow switching of classes (ex. multiple Mutators)
        Returns:
        the choice

      • createConfigurationChoices

        public static <O extends Configurable> ConfigurableChoice<O> createConfigurationChoices​(String name,
                                                                                        O c)
        Helper function that takes any configurable (Ex. an Algorithm) and creates the configuration hierarchy
        Type Parameters:
        O - anything that extends Configurable
        Parameters:
        name - Name that is given to the configurable (to find it again later)
        c - object that shall be used in experiment
        Returns:
        Choice to be used in Experiment -> All non-Configurables will be returned as "FixedChoice"

      • createConfigurationChoices

        public static <O extends Configurable> ConfigurableChoice<O> createConfigurationChoices​(String name,
                                                                                        O c,
                                                                                        boolean prepareChoices,
                                                                                        boolean makeValuesExchangeable)
        Helper function that takes any configurable (Ex. an Algorithm) and creates the configuration hierarchy
        Type Parameters:
        O - anything that extends Configurable
        Parameters:
        c - object that shall be used in experiment
        prepareChoices - if true all choices will be prepared with as many choices as possible. If false everything will be set to FixedChoice
        makeValuesExchangeable - if true for any complex configuration (incl. Configurable) a SingleUnwrappingChoice is used to allow switching of classes (ex. multiple Mutators)
        Returns:
        Choice to be used in Experiment

      • conductExperiment

        public ExperimentResult<ST,​PT> conductExperiment()
        Runs all of the algorithms with the given problem genes
        Returns:
        result of all runs
